column1: Little Goat Diner////I wandered into the diner as my chosen restaurant had a long waiting time. We were seated quickly and were given a direct view of the kitchen. Even though there was a crowd of people to serve
column2: the server was kind enough to recommend some great options. We chose the Bullseye French Toast
column3: paired with the chocolate malt beer and the Shrimp noodles
column4: along with the house beer. The food was terrific. I chose the french toast and fulfilled my dream of eating breakfast with beer.
